title: AI Stock Assistant
description: Ask any stock related question, and my chatbot will search latest news, draw charts. Developed utilizing the Groq AI Inference API key; Visualized charts, trades, screens through TradingView UI components.

title: Tarly AI
description: Cursor for Resumes; get a Personal website in 30 seconds.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:a,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const t={a:"a",h2:"h2",p:"p",span:"span",...r.components};return n(e,{children:[n(t.h2,{id:"what-is-tarly-ai",children:[a(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#what-is-tarly-ai",children:a(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"What is Tarly AI?"]}),"
",a("br",{}),"
",a("iframe",{src:"https://www.loom.com/embed/8fc65583e799474581cc67c10948ec5b?sid=14484bdd-37f5-4c8d-8690-c23069f928b4",frameBorder:"0",allowFullScreen:!0,className:"w-full aspect-video rounded-lg"}),"
",n(t.h2,{id:"introduction",children:[a(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#introduction",children:a(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Introduction"]}),"
",a(t.p,{children:"Tarly is the personal brand infrastructure for modern professionals. Pro-grade CVs, LaTeX formatting, Personal websites, and Career roadmaps, all in one. Loved by early adopters from Higgsfield AI, Surfaice AI, Google STEP and more..."}),"
",n(t.h2,{id:"a-story-behind-it",children:[a(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#a-story-behind-it",children:a(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"A story behind it"]}),"
",a(t.p,{children:'I’m a developer myself, and I know that feeling when your resume/CV gets ghosted. "Thanks" to all those ATS optimizations, relevence scores, and impact metrics. When I created my first CV, I spent a ton of time searching for templates, struggling with LaTeX syntax. I'd just copied it and paste it into ChatGPT to change something, then again copied updated version, pasted in Overleaf, recompiled it... over and over again..'}),"
",n(t.p,{children:['Plus, most digital professionals are "required" to have Personal Website to showcase experience, projects, and thoughts. You can generate one in 1 min at ',a("a",{href:"https://tarly.works/your-name",target:"_blank",children:"tarly.works/your-name"})]}),"
",n(t.h2,{id:"features",children:[a(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#features",children:a(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Features"]}),"
",a(t.p,{children:"◆ Create a pro-grade, ATS-friendly CV."}),"
",a(t.p,{children:"◆ Edit your Resume via LLM prompts (like in Cursor)."}),"
",a(t.p,{children:"◆ Generate a tailored career roadmap based on your PDF resume."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:["◆ Package everything into a shareable Personal website (",a("a",{href:"https://tarly.works/your-name",target:"_blank",children:"tarly.works/your-name"}),")"]}),"
",n(t.h2,{id:"web-analytics",children:[a(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#web-analytics",children:a(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Web Analytics"]}),"
",a("br",{}),"
",a("div",{className:"flex flex-col justify-between w-full",children:a("img",{src:"/static/num-661994.png"})}),"
",n(t.h2,{id:"show-some-support",children:[a(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#show-some-support",children:a(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Show Some Support"]}),"
",a(t.p,{children:"Love Tarly AI? Support us on Product Hunt!"}),"
"," ","
",a("a",{href:"https://www.producthunt.com/products/tarly-ai?embed=true&utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_source=badge-tarly-ai",target:"_blank",children:a("img",{src:"https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=996905&theme=light&t=1753346814917",alt:"Tarly AI | Product Hunt Upvotes",className:"w-[180px] h-[54px] "})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:n}=e.components||{};return n?a(n,{...e,children:a(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
